title: Send Email Workflow Block
body:
Send Email Workflow Block¶

The Send Email block allows you to send an email to a contact’s email address.
This block is used to send a notification to the contact enrolled in the workflow. Click here to notify someone internally (within your organization).
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the workflow design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place a Send Email block in your workflow where desired

  2. Click Choose an email

  3. Select an existing email from the list

  4. Alternatively, click Add New to create a new email (this list will automatically be chosen)

    • Enter a title

    • Choose a template

    • Choose a sender

    • Enter the email address customers will write to if they choose to reply to their confirmation email

    • Enter a subject

    • Click Save

  5. Click Done
